 Talk How to Enable Opera Turbo   
 Opera browser can boost your browsing speed with its Turbo mode. This feature increases the runtime priority of the application, which helps in accelerating the browsing speed. Enabling it is easy, once you know how. 
 10 Second Summary Edit 
 1. Press  Alt + P  to open the settings page. 
2. Scroll down and check on  Show advanced settings  box. 
3. Click on  Browser  from the left panel and check on  Enable Opera Turbo  box. 
 Steps Edit

 Open Opera browser on your computer (v34 or above).  Make sure that you are using the  latest version  of Opera browser.

 Open Settings.  Click on  Menu  from the left corner and select  Settings  from the list.
 Alternatively, you can press  Alt + P  on your keyboard to open the Settings page.

 3 
 Enable advanced settings.  Scroll down to bottom and check the  Show advanced settings  box.

 4 
 Open Browser Settings.  Click on  Browser  from the left side.

 Enable Turbo Mode.  Check the  Enable Opera Turbo  box to enable Opera Turbo.

 6 
 Done.  Enjoy the internet more smoothly.
